transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Defense
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Delta Burst
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. When the target's Max Health is equal to or lower than Delta's Max Health, this attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.\nThis skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves all debuffs from the caster\nIncreases damage

description: Attacks an enemy. When the target's Max Health is equal to or lower than Delta's Max Health, this attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.\nThis skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Code: Machine Gun Fist
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Triggered Effect)
Prepares the <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> effect for every <color=#28d9ed>cooldown cycle</color> of this skill.
When <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> is activated, attacks the target and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance each to grant <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
This skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description:

This skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Delta's Forbidden Technique
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nWhen the target is a Boss or the target's Max Health is equal to or lower than Delta's Max Health, this attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.\nThis skill’s damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
description: Attacks an enemy, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Counterattack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000099_3_1] turn(s)</color>.\nWhen the target is a Boss or the target's Max Health is equal to or lower than Delta's Max Health, this attack penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.\nThis skillâs damage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, grants Counterattack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, grants Counterattack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000099_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
